translation.en: WOMAN: This big one. MAN: No, no, she can't have that.
translation.zh: -这个大的-不 不可以

translation.en: What is it, Phoebs?
translation.zh: 是什么 菲比？

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 是什么啊？

translation.en: PHOEBE: [indistinct]
translation.zh: 显微镜！

translation.en: MAN: Excellent.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: Did you want that?
translation.zh: 你想要的吗？

translation.en: Yes? Yes.
translation.zh: -想吗？-想

translation.en: How does he know what you want?
translation.zh: 他怎么知道你想要什么

translation.en: You must have been such a good girl.
translation.zh: 你一定是个乖女孩

translation.en: MAN: Did Santa get it right?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人送对了吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对了

translation.en: MAN: Right, Elliot, anything for you, buddy?
translation.zh: 好了 埃利奥特 你的是什么？

translation.en: Well, I think we might have one more.
translation.zh: 我想我们可能还有一份礼物

translation.en: Maybe, it might be this one.
translation.zh: 也许就是这个

translation.en: MAN: This is what Santa gives you.
translation.zh: 这是圣诞老人给你的

translation.en: I love you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我爱你 谢谢

translation.en: It's not me, it's Santa.
translation.zh: 不是我 是圣诞老人

translation.en: No. Really? Yes.
translation.zh: -不是-是

translation.en: Is that the one we saw?
translation.zh: -真的吗？-是我们看的那个吗？

translation.en: Come on, Dad, you promised we'd go to the festival.
translation.zh: 快点 爸爸 你答应过我们去过节的

translation.en: Yeah, you promised.
translation.zh: 是啊 你答应过了

translation.en: Okay, okay. We'll go to the festival.
translation.zh: 好 我们去过节

translation.en: Which one can I get for three bucks?
translation.zh: 三美元我能带走哪只？

translation.en: Well, how about, if you can convince your parents
translation.zh: 如果你能说服爸妈今天带一只回家

translation.en: to take one home today, I'll give you three bucks
translation.zh: 如果你能说服爸妈今天带一只回家 我就给你三美元买第一袋狗粮

translation.en: to buy its first bag of puppy food.
translation.zh: 我就给你三美元买第一袋狗粮

translation.en: Phoebe, no, forget it, Dad will never go for it.
translation.zh: 菲比 算了吧 爸爸不会答应的

translation.en: Don't listen to him,
translation.zh: 别听他的

translation.en: we'll take one puppy in a to-go box, please.
translation.zh: 我们要领养一只小狗

translation.en: My dad won't mind. It's a surprise.
translation.zh: 我爸爸不介意的 这是个惊喜

translation.en: Phoebe, no, we're about to order
translation.zh: 菲比 不 我们得去点单了

translation.en: and Dad's already mad you came out here without permission.
translation.zh: 爸爸已经对你不经允许跑出来不高兴了

translation.en: Come on,
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: not even for the crazy-eyed spaz in the back corner?
translation.zh: 即使是后排那个笨家伙也不行吗？

translation.en: Oh. Looks like I'd be doing you the favor.
translation.zh: 看来是我在帮你

translation.en: That would-- Oh, there they are!
translation.zh: 天啊 他们来了！

translation.en: What would my two most favorite customers like today?
translation.zh: 我的两位小客人今天想要点什么？

translation.en: How about a break from the baloney?
translation.zh: 少说几句废话怎么样？

translation.en: Fruit tarts for both of us please.
translation.zh: 我们俩都要水果塔

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Phoebe?
translation.zh: 菲比？

translation.en: Now what did we all talk about last night?
translation.zh: 我们昨晚说了什么？

translation.en: How we should respect Daniela
translation.zh: 我们应该尊重丹妮拉

translation.en: because she's your new girlfriend.
translation.zh: 因为她是你的新女友

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: No, no, she's not my girlfriend.
translation.zh: 不 她不是我的女朋友

translation.en: Yet.
translation.zh: 还不是

translation.en: We've only gone out a couple of times.
translation.zh: 我们只是约会过几次

translation.en: Now look, she's trying really hard with you guys,
translation.zh: 看啊 她在努力和你们打好关系

translation.en: so I would appreciate it if you would be nice,
translation.zh: 所以你们俩要是能乖一点

translation.en: both of you.
translation.zh: 我会很感谢

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: All righty, here we have two tarts for the two of you
translation.zh: 好了 这里是你们俩的水果塔

translation.en: and one yummy chocolate croissant for the handsome man.
translation.zh: 还有一个美味巧克力羊角面包属于这位帅哥

translation.en: I baked these fresh just for you and you.
translation.zh: 我为你和你现烤的

translation.en: Well, thank you, we appreciate it.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我们很感激

translation.en: One piping hot pumpkin spiced latte to go.
translation.zh: 一杯滚烫的南瓜拿铁外带

translation.en: Thank you. Kids, what do we say?
translation.zh: 谢谢 孩子们 该说什么？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-谢谢

translation.en: DANI: Oh, no problem.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: So are we still on for tomorrow night?
translation.zh: 我们明晚出去吗？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. I forgot to ask their grandmother if she could stay.
translation.zh: 我不确定 我忘了问他们的奶奶能不能晚上留下来照顾他们

translation.en: Oh, why don't I just come over and cook dinner for everybody?
translation.zh: 那不如我过去给大家做顿晚餐

translation.en: How about that?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds-- that's wonderful.
translation.zh: 听起来好极了

translation.en: Okay, I'll see you at 7:00.
translation.zh: 好的 那七点见

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 好的 拜拜

translation.en: You lucky lou.
translation.zh: 你真幸运

translation.en: What a hunky slab of pumpkin bread that is.
translation.zh: 这块儿南瓜面包可真不错

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Oh, and you should see the house they live in,
translation.zh: 你应该看看他们住的房子

translation.en: it's beautiful.
translation.zh: 非常漂亮

translation.en: It sounds almost perfect.
translation.zh: 听起来很完美

translation.en: Too bad his kids are such snarky little tarts.
translation.zh: 可惜他的孩子都是些刻薄的小鬼头

translation.en: That doesn't faze me.
translation.zh: 我不会担心那个

translation.en: Nothing a little discipline can't fix.
translation.zh: 一点纪律就能解决一切问题

translation.en: Oh, it's you again.
translation.zh: 又是你

translation.en: Did your parents change their mind?
translation.zh: 你的父母改主意了吗？

translation.en: Did your parents change their mind about what?
translation.zh: 关于什么改主意？

translation.en: Elliot, you did not tell this nice lady
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 你没有告诉这位女士

translation.en: that we were looking to adopt a dog, did you?
translation.zh: 我们准备领养小狗吧？

translation.en: No, Dad, I didn't.
translation.zh: 不 爸爸 我没有 我只是…

translation.en: I just-- Earlier Phoebe was over here and I--
translation.zh: 菲比之前来过…

translation.en: Oh, I don't know what's gotten into her.
translation.zh: 我不知道她怎么了

translation.en: It looks like she likes you.
translation.zh: 她看起来很喜欢你

translation.en: Okay, she is very, very, very cute, okay,
translation.zh: 好吧 她很可爱

translation.en: but the Barrows family household has a very strict no puppy policy.
translation.zh: 但巴罗斯家有一条非常严格的禁止养狗的规定

translation.en: Oh, are you allergic, Mr. Barrows?
translation.zh: 你过敏吗？巴罗斯先生

translation.en: No, no.
translation.zh: 没有 那我可以问问为什么禁止吗？

translation.en: So may I ask why the policy?
translation.zh: 那我可以问问为什么禁止吗？

translation.en: Okay, fine, here's how this scenario unfolds.
translation.zh: 好吧 事情的发展会是这样

translation.en: Adopt lovely canine for the kids
translation.zh: 为孩子们领养了一只可爱的小狗

translation.en: and after a couple of weeks, kids lose interest
translation.zh: 几周之后

translation.en: and Pops ends up taking care of said canine
translation.zh: 孩子对狗狗失去兴趣 然后接下来十年到十二年里我都要照顾这只狗

translation.en: for the next 10 to 12.
translation.zh: 然后接下来十年到十二年里我都要照顾这只狗

translation.en: Is that how you guys see this scenario playing out?
translation.zh: 你们是这么想的吗？

translation.en: No, ma'am.
translation.zh: -不 女士-因为听起来

translation.en: 'Cause it sounds like you've been skipping out on your chores
translation.zh: 你们一直在逃避家务

translation.en: and leaving them for good old Pops, huh?
translation.zh: 把它们留给老父亲啊 是吗？

translation.en: Well, no--
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Well, sometimes when I say I dusted the mantel,
translation.zh: 好吧 有时我说我打扫了壁炉架

translation.en: when I really just blew the surface,
translation.zh: 实际上我只是打扫了表面

translation.en: but typically no.
translation.zh: 但通常来说没有

translation.en: Because, you know, this is a shepherd mix.
translation.zh: 你们知道 这是混种牧羊犬

translation.en: She's gonna eat a lot and poop a lot and shed a lot.
translation.zh: 她吃很多 拉很多 还会掉很多毛

translation.en: Basically drive you crazy for the first year or two that you have her.
translation.zh: 基本上在你和她在一起的头一两年里就会把你逼疯

translation.en: But she's also gonna crack you up every day.
translation.zh: 但她也会每天逗你开心

translation.en: And she's gonna cuddle you like crazy
translation.zh: 她会疯狂地拥抱你

translation.en: and basically love you unconditionally till her last day on earth.
translation.zh: 无条件地爱你直到她生命的最后一天

translation.en: I promise you won't regret it.
translation.zh: 我保证你们不会后悔

translation.en: That's a very, very good pitch, I will give you that.
translation.zh: 我要说这是一个非常非常好的演讲 很抱歉 我们不能 今年不行

translation.en: I'm sorry, we just can't do it, not this year,
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我们不能 今年不行

translation.en: but I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 但我很欣赏你的演讲

translation.en: Thank you. Come on, kids, let's go.
translation.zh: 谢谢了 孩子们 我们走了

translation.en: Daddy, please. Honey, come on.
translation.zh: -爸爸 拜托-宝贝 走了

translation.en: Hey, guys, will one of you get the door please?
translation.zh: 伙计们 你们能不能开下门？

translation.en: Ah, my merry little mischief makers.
translation.zh: 我快乐的小捣蛋们

translation.en: It's good to see you. Grandma.
translation.zh: -见到你们真高兴-外婆

translation.en: What's wrong, Elliot?
translation.zh: 怎么了？埃利奥特

translation.en: Are you not happy to see your wrinkly old granny?
translation.zh: 见到你那满脸皱纹的老奶奶不高兴吗？

translation.en: He's crying because you called him mischief maker.
translation.zh: 他哭是因为你叫他小捣蛋

translation.en: Mom called us that sometimes too.
translation.zh: 妈妈有时也这么叫我们

translation.en: Nuh-uh. I wasn't crying, Phoebe.
translation.zh: 我没有哭 菲比

translation.en: Grandma's perfume burned my eyes.
translation.zh: 外婆的香水熏了我的眼睛

translation.en: Well, did your mama never tell you where that nickname came from?
translation.zh: 妈妈有没有告诉过你们那个昵称的由来

translation.en: She got it from herself.
translation.zh: 因为她自己就是

translation.en: Every Christmas Eve when she and Uncle Ted were your age,
translation.zh: 在她和泰德舅舅像你们这么大时每年的圣诞前夜

translation.en: they would sneak down the stairs
translation.zh: 他们会偷偷地走下楼梯

translation.en: and try to unwrap every present under the tree
translation.zh: 试着在树下打开每一份礼物

translation.en: without tearing any of the wrapping paper.
translation.zh: 又不撕破任何包装纸

translation.en: One year, your mama even got a roll of scotch tape
translation.zh: 有一年 你们妈妈甚至拿了一卷透明胶带

translation.en: and she tried to re-tape the things that they'd accidentally torn
translation.zh: 她试图把他们不小心撕破的东西重新粘上

translation.en: and I'll tell you what,
translation.zh: 我告诉你们

translation.en: sly old Granny was waiting and watching.
translation.zh: 狡猾的外婆一直盯着呢

translation.en: I caught her red handed!
translation.zh: 我当场抓住了她

translation.en: Gee, Mom sure was naughty,
translation.zh: 天 妈妈一定很调皮

translation.en: must be where I get it from.
translation.zh: 我一定是遗传她的

translation.en: Maybe so.
translation.zh: 也许吧

translation.en: But why call us that?
translation.zh: 但为什么那么叫我们

translation.en: We never did anything to earn Mom's nickname.
translation.zh: 我们从来没做过什么

translation.en: Well, honey, never say never.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 永远不要说永远

translation.en: You don't know what mischief the holidays can bring.
translation.zh: 你不知道假期会带来什么恶作剧

translation.en: I don't want Mom's nickname.
translation.zh: 我不想要妈妈的昵称

translation.en: Oh, hey, Marnie, thank you so much for coming.
translation.zh: 嗨 玛妮 非常感谢你能来

translation.en: I really appreciate it.
translation.zh: 我真的很感激

translation.en: I didn't even think about
translation.zh: 我都没想过需要保姆

translation.en: needing a sitter, this being the first time since--
translation.zh: 我都没想过需要保姆 这是我第一次

translation.en: Don't mention it. You know I love being here.
translation.zh: 别提了 你知道我喜欢来这里

translation.en: Should I feed them dinner too?
translation.zh: 我要给他们做晚餐吗？

translation.en: No, no, I should be done and back by 6:00, so...
translation.zh: 不 我应该六点就回来了

translation.en: Well, I'm already here.
translation.zh: 我已经来了

translation.en: I might as well fix them a proper meal.
translation.zh: 我可以给他们做顿好吃的

translation.en: I bet the kids are getting tired of rotisserie chicken from the grocery store.
translation.zh: 我敢说孩子们一定吃腻了杂货店的烤鸡

translation.en: Oh, you know me too well, Marnie.
translation.zh: 你太了解我了 玛妮

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Actually, that lady friend that I told you about,
translation.zh: 事实上… 我之前说过的女性朋友

translation.en: she was actually planning on coming by and cooking, so--
translation.zh: 她计划过来做晚餐 所以…

translation.en: That's nice.
translation.zh: 那很好

translation.en: Maybe you can stay and you could meet her,
translation.zh: 也许你可以留下来见见她

translation.en: unless that would be weird.
translation.zh: 除非那会很奇怪

translation.en: Glenn, you know, I've told you a thousand times,
translation.zh: 格林 你知道 我跟你说过很多次

translation.en: my Janey loved you.
translation.zh: 我的珍妮很爱你

translation.en: She would want you to find somebody to make you and the kids happy.
translation.zh: 她会希望你找到一个能让你和孩子们幸福的人

translation.en: And, of course, you know I would want to meet her.
translation.zh: 当然了 我想见见她

translation.en: I love you like a son.
translation.zh: 我像爱儿子一样爱你

translation.en: Now you get on out of here before it's too late.
translation.zh: 现在你快走吧免得迟到

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: See you, honey.
translation.zh: 再见 亲爱的

translation.en: So that's what you think of the lady your daddy's seeing?
translation.zh: 这就是你对你爸爸约会对象的看法吗？

translation.en: If I said out loud what I thought of her, Grandma,
translation.zh: 如果我大声说出我对她的看法 外婆

translation.en: Santa would surely skip bringing me presents this year.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人今年肯定不会给我送礼物

translation.en: Oh, that's really bad.
translation.zh: 那真是太糟了

translation.en: Hey, buddy.
translation.zh: 小伙子

translation.en: Did you ask Malcolm if he wanted to ride bikes with you?
translation.zh: 你问马尔科姆要不要和你一起骑自行车了吗？

translation.en: Elliot, I don't want to do anything
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 我不想做任何

translation.en: that makes you or your sister uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 让你姐姐不舒服的事情

translation.en: Okay, so if it's too early for all this stuff,
translation.zh: 所以如果这种事情对你们来说太早了

translation.en: I'll just tell Dani that-- No, Dad, it's fine.
translation.zh: -我可以告诉丹妮-不 爸爸 没关系

translation.en: If you like her, I want you to be happy.
translation.zh: 如果你喜欢她 我希望你开心

translation.en: I'm sure deep down Phoebe does too.
translation.zh: 我相信菲比也是一样的

translation.en: I want us all to be happy, buddy.
translation.zh: 我想我们都开心

translation.en: Be careful out here, will you?
translation.zh: 小心点 知道吗？

translation.en: All right. Love you. You too.
translation.zh: -好 爱你-我也是

translation.en: Boom.
translation.zh: 砰

translation.en: Blindsided by the blonde.
translation.zh: 被那个金发女郎给骗了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: When my dad left, my mom said
translation.zh: 我爸走的时候 我妈说

translation.en: it was because he was blindsided by a big booty,
translation.zh: 是因为他被一个翘臀女给骗了

translation.en: but your dad, same thing,
translation.zh: 你爸爸是一样的

translation.en: only a big-headed blonde.
translation.zh: 只是换成了大头金发女

translation.en: Thought you were going to a Christmas play
translation.zh: 我以为你今天要和你妈妈

translation.en: with your mom at your church today.
translation.zh: 去教堂看圣诞剧

translation.en: Got out of it.
translation.zh: 不去了 说我吃了芸豆宵夜

translation.en: Said I had kidney beans for a late-night snack.
translation.zh: 说我吃了芸豆宵夜

translation.en: And that if she took me, I'd be pooting on the pews.
translation.zh: 如果她带我去 我会在教堂里拉肚子

translation.en: Have you ever heard of a poot on a pew?
translation.zh: 你听说过在教堂里拉肚子吗？

translation.en: It sounds like a choir, one praising hallelujah.
translation.zh: 听起来像唱诗班一个人在歌颂哈利路亚

translation.en: So why didn't you want to go?
translation.zh: 你为什么不想去？

translation.en: Well, it's not like I could ever leave you alone.
translation.zh: 我又不能丢下你一个人

translation.en: You've been such a sad Santa sack ever since school let out.
translation.zh: 自从学校放假后你就一直是个悲伤的圣诞老人

translation.en: How many times do I have to tell you?
translation.zh: 我要跟你说多少次？

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: So what are you doing out here all alone anyway?
translation.zh: 那你一个人在这里做什么？

translation.en: I was trying to be alone.
translation.zh: 我想一个人待着

translation.en: Or maybe you were trying
translation.zh: 或者你是想

translation.en: to drive back and forth past the Kane residence,
translation.zh: 在凯恩家门前来回骑车

translation.en: wait and see if a certain third-grader was selling hot chocolate like last year.
translation.zh: 等着看是否有某个三年级学生像去年一样卖热巧克力

translation.en: I already told you, Malcolm, I don't like Riley Kane, okay?
translation.zh: 我已经说过了 马尔科姆我不喜欢莱丽凯恩 好吗？

translation.en: Not even when she's looking all fine
translation.zh: 即使她穿着冬天最好看的

translation.en: like that in her winter's best?
translation.zh: 像那样的衣服？ （热可可）

translation.en: I don't know about you, but I'm thirsty.
translation.zh: 我不知道你怎么样 但我渴了

translation.en: You're not getting free cocoa again this year, Malcolm.
translation.zh: 今年你不会免费喝到可可了 马尔科姆

translation.en: If you really have low blood sugar,
translation.zh: 如果你真的低血糖

translation.en: go and see your pediatrician.
translation.zh: 去看你的儿科医生

translation.en: I wasn't asking for a handout.
translation.zh: 我不是要你施舍

translation.en: A man with a job gladly pays for his cocoa.
translation.zh: 有工作的人很乐意为他的可可买单

translation.en: Now extra marshmallows please.
translation.zh: （慈善热可可2.5美元） 再来点棉花糖

translation.en: And what's this alleged job of yours anyways, Malcolm?
translation.zh: 你所谓的工作是什么 马尔科姆？

translation.en: I scoop doggie doo
translation.zh: 我为西区的市民们铲狗屎

translation.en: for the greater citizens on the west block.
translation.zh: 我为西区的市民们铲狗屎 （慈善热可可2.5美元）

translation.en: So what's the cause?
translation.zh: 所以是做什么慈善？

translation.en: All proceeds go to Hands on Paws, our local dog rescue.
translation.zh: 所有的钱都捐给手掌上的小脚印我们本地的狗狗救助

translation.en: Hey, they were set up in front of the bakery.
translation.zh: 他们在面包店前面

translation.en: Had a really cute pup I loved.
translation.zh: 有一只可爱狗狗我很喜欢

translation.en: You like dogs too, Elliot?
translation.zh: 你也喜欢狗狗吗 埃利奥特？

translation.en: Sure I do.
translation.zh: 当然喜欢

translation.en: My dad won't let us get one,
translation.zh: 我爸爸不让我们养

translation.en: but I really wish we could.
translation.zh: 但我真的希望能养一只

translation.en: My parents won't let me get one either.
translation.zh: 我的父母也不让

translation.en: It's nice you're trying to help all the dogs with the fundraiser though.
translation.zh: 不过你想筹款帮助狗狗 真不错

translation.en: The things a boy will say to get a girl to believe him.
translation.zh: 男孩为了让女孩相信他而说的话

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: I bet he never even heard of Hands on Paws before you mentioned it.
translation.zh: 我敢说在你提到之前他都没听说过手掌上的小脚印

translation.en: Besides, you're hardly mature enough
translation.zh: 此外 你还没成熟到能负责任地养狗埃利奥特

translation.en: to handle a dog responsibly, Elliot.
translation.zh: 你还没成熟到能负责任地养狗埃利奥特 而你还没成熟到

translation.en: And you're hardly mature enough
translation.zh: 而你还没成熟到

translation.en: to handle a gentleman like my fine friend here.
translation.zh: 能应付像我这位好朋友这样的绅士

translation.en: Now quit gawking at him like you're not mad
translation.zh: 别傻傻地看着他 好像你没有因为

translation.en: he didn't talk to you first, Penny "Whiner."
translation.zh: 他没先跟你说话而生气似的牢骚佩妮

translation.en: You had your cocoa, so leave already.
translation.zh: 你已经拿到可可了 走开点吧

translation.en: No loitering.
translation.zh: 禁止闲逛

translation.en: Goodness, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 天啊 我很抱歉

translation.en: If I had known there was gonna be a guest,
translation.zh: 要是我知道会有个客人

translation.en: I would have brought another cranberry cornish hen.
translation.zh: 我会再带一只蔓越莓康沃尔母鸡来

translation.en: But you are the guest,
translation.zh: 但你才是客人

translation.en: so how did you not know you'd be here, silly?
translation.zh: 所以你怎么会不知道自己会来傻瓜？

translation.en: It's fine. Phoebe and I will share.
translation.zh: 没事 菲比和我分享就好了

translation.en: Oh, good.
translation.zh: -很好-话说丹妮拉

translation.en: So, Daniela, what kind of work do you do?
translation.zh: 你是做什么工作的？

translation.en: Oh, well, I work at the bakery down on Main Street.
translation.zh: 我在主街的面包店工作

translation.en: Which explains why she's such a good cook, doesn't it, guys?
translation.zh: 这就解释了为什么她厨艺这么好不是吗 伙计们？

translation.en: Well, now that's a nice little place.
translation.zh: 那真是个不错的地方

translation.en: So have you always lived in Tennessee?
translation.zh: 你一直住在田纳西州吗？

translation.en: Oh, well, I actually lived in L.A. for a little bit.
translation.zh: 我在洛杉矶住过一段时间

translation.en: You know, I did some modeling and some acting and that just didn't pan out.
translation.zh: 我做过模特 也演过戏 但都不成功

translation.en: So I'm back here starting fresh and anew.
translation.zh: 所以我回到这里重新开始

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: What did you say your last name was again?
translation.zh: 你说你姓什么来着？

translation.en: Oh, it's Downy.
translation.zh: 唐尼

translation.en: Uh, Dani actually said she knew of Janey in school.
translation.zh: 丹妮说她在学校就认识珍妮

translation.en: Yes, Daniela, I do believe I remember you.
translation.zh: 是的 丹妮拉 我想我记得你

translation.en: You were in a bunch of local pageants growing up,
translation.zh: 我记得你小时候参加过很多本地的选美比赛

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Yes, I was.
translation.zh: 是的 没错

translation.en: Fancy that, someone who went to my pageants.
translation.zh: 想不到居然有人看过我的选美比赛

translation.en: Oh, I didn't.
translation.zh: 我没有

translation.en: I just...
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: I read about them in the paper, that's all.
translation.zh: 我在报纸上看到过 仅此而已

translation.en: Oh. That's a pretty sharp memory there, Marnie.
translation.zh: 你的记忆力真好 玛妮

translation.en: Wait. So you knew my mom and you think it's okay to like my dad?
translation.zh: 等下 你认识我妈妈你觉得喜欢我爸爸是合适的吗？

translation.en: Elliot, I barely knew your mom,
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 我不算认识你妈妈

translation.en: you know, and I've been getting your daddy's coffee
translation.zh: 我给你爸爸做咖啡已经一年多了

translation.en: for over a year now and never knew that Janey--
translation.zh: 但我从来不知道 珍妮

translation.en: Well, you know, I just wanted to make you all a nice dinner.
translation.zh: 我只是想给你们做顿丰盛的晚餐

translation.en: It's just really weird.
translation.zh: 真奇怪

translation.en: No wonder she did bad in L.A.
translation.zh: 难怪她在洛杉矶发展不好

translation.en: That was a terrible performance.
translation.zh: 那是一场糟糕的表演

translation.en: I think you guys owe Dani an apology.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们应该给丹妮道歉

translation.en: Oh, my.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: You know, those ungrateful little heathens,
translation.zh: 你知道 那些忘恩负义的小异教徒

translation.en: I mean, those Cornish hens, those are a real pain in my--
translation.zh: 那些康沃尔母鸡 真让我头疼…

translation.en: Oh. Just a minute.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh: 你没事吧

translation.en: Yeah, I'll be fine.
translation.zh: 我会没事的

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: I mean, this whole situation's just so new for everybody,
translation.zh: 这一切对大家来说都很陌生

translation.en: and they're just--
translation.zh: -他们只是-好吧

translation.en: I completely understand.
translation.zh: 我完全理解

translation.en: I mean, I know because I lost my mother
translation.zh: 我是说 我知道是因为我的母亲在假日离开了

translation.en: over the holidays and I know exactly
translation.zh: 我知道是因为我的母亲在假日离开了 我知道他们在经历什么

translation.en: what they're going through, so...
translation.zh: 我知道他们在经历什么

translation.en: I'm sorry. I had no idea. I do, I do.
translation.zh: -我很抱歉 我不知道-我知道

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Elliot, are you okay, honey?
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 你没事吧 亲爱的？

translation.en: Well, if it's any consolation,
translation.zh: 如果能安慰到你们的话

translation.en: your mother didn't care for Dani either.
translation.zh: 你们妈妈也不太在意丹妮

translation.en: But that information is strictly between us big kids.
translation.zh: 但这事只能由两个大孩子知道

translation.en: Pinky swear?
translation.zh: 拉钩？

translation.en: And I only say that because your daddy needs to find out for himself.
translation.zh: 我这么说只是因为你们爸爸需要自己去发现

translation.en: He probably thinks he's doing what's right
translation.zh: 他可能觉得他现在这么做是为你们好

translation.en: for you kids right now, but he's a smart man.
translation.zh: 他可能觉得他现在这么做是为你们好 但他是个聪明人

translation.en: Just give him a little time, okay?
translation.zh: 给他一点时间 好吗？

translation.en: But I thought she said she didn't know Mom that well.
translation.zh: 但她说了她和妈妈不太熟

translation.en: Mom didn't like her?
translation.zh: 妈妈不喜欢她吗？ 亲爱的 你们妈妈喜欢每个人

translation.en: Honey, your mama liked everyone.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你们妈妈喜欢每个人

translation.en: It was Dani who was jealous of your mom.
translation.zh: 是丹妮嫉妒你们妈妈

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Well, back when they were seniors,
translation.zh: 那时候她们都是毕业班学生

translation.en: your mom was voted the most popular in school
translation.zh: 你们妈妈被选为学校里最受欢迎的人

translation.en: and somehow Dani claimed that the ballots
translation.zh: 丹妮声称选票被操纵了

translation.en: had been rigged, but when they did a recount,
translation.zh: 丹妮声称选票被操纵了 但当他们重新计票时

translation.en: Janey won by a landslide.
translation.zh: 发现珍妮以压倒性优势获胜

translation.en: Can you imagine?
translation.zh: 你们能想象吗？

translation.en: Daniela Dani must have fake cried the whole way home.
translation.zh: 丹妮拉在回家的路上一定一直在假哭

translation.en: Guys, is there something you'd like to say to Dani?
translation.zh: 孩子们 你们有什么要对丹妮说的吗？

translation.en: BOTH: Sorry.
translation.zh: -对不起-对不起

translation.en: Is there anything else you want to say to Dani?
translation.zh: 还有什么要对丹妮说的吗？

translation.en: Food?
translation.zh: 关于食物？

translation.en: BOTH: Thanks for the food.
translation.zh: -谢谢你的食物-谢谢你的食物

translation.en: Yes, thank you, Dani.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 丹妮

translation.en: Oh, you are so welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: I actually made the same meal
translation.zh: 我在收容所给无家可归的人

translation.en: for the homeless down at the shelters, quite a treat.
translation.zh: 做了同样的食物 很好吃

translation.en: GLENN: Well, that's very nice of you.
translation.zh: 你真是善良

translation.en: And, guys, since Dani doesn't have any family to go home to
translation.zh: 伙计们 因为丹妮没有家人可以一起过节

translation.en: for the holidays, I told her that she could spend the holidays with us, okay?
translation.zh: 我告诉她她可以和我们一起过节 好吗？

translation.en: DANI: And thank you so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你们

translation.en: I mean, you don't know how much this means to me.
translation.zh: 你门不知道这对我有多重要

translation.en: I thought I was gonna have to spend the holidays
translation.zh: 我还以为我要一个人在我那间

translation.en: all by myself in my dreary little house
translation.zh: 沉闷的小房子里过假期了

translation.en: but, oh, we get to make pies and play games
translation.zh: 但是现在我们可以做馅饼 玩游戏

translation.en: and, oh, it's just gonna be the best holiday ever together!
translation.zh: 这将是我们一起度过的最好的假期

translation.en: Oh, I got lots to do.
translation.zh: 我有很多事情要做

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: How do I-- Oh.
translation.zh: 我怎么会…

translation.en: Oh, good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: Hey, good morning. How did you sleep?
translation.zh: 早上好 睡得好吗？

translation.en: Oh, that bed is more comfortable
translation.zh: 早上好 睡得好吗？ 床太舒服了

translation.en: than the one I sleep on at home every night.
translation.zh: 比我每晚睡的床好太多 你们在这里做什么？

translation.en: So what are you guys up to here?
translation.zh: 你们在这里做什么？

translation.en: We are making French toast.
translation.zh: 我们正在做法式吐司

translation.en: French toast!
translation.zh: 法式吐司！

translation.en: Oh, I make the best French toast.
translation.zh: 我能做最好吃的法式吐司

translation.en: Here, let me handle this.
translation.zh: 让我来吧

translation.en: I've got bread, got our eggs.
translation.zh: 有面包 四个鸡蛋

translation.en: Oh, milk, I got to get some milk.
translation.zh: 牛奶 我还要点牛奶

translation.en: Hey, you brought the puppy!
translation.zh: 你把狗狗带来了！

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I didn't get your name the other day.
translation.zh: 那天我没问你的名字

translation.en: It's Elliot.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特

translation.en: Well, is your dad home, Elliot?
translation.zh: 你爸爸在家吗 埃利奥特？

translation.en: Puppy!
translation.zh: 狗狗！

translation.en: Can you hold her? Yeah.
translation.zh: -你能抱着她吗？-当然

translation.en: Elliot, did you--
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 你…

translation.en: No, no, it wasn't him. It was me.
translation.zh: 不 不是他 是我带来的

translation.en: Look, I can't really explain it
translation.zh: 听着 我很难解释

translation.en: but what happened with this dog and Elliot yesterday, it's--
translation.zh: 但是昨天这只狗狗和埃利奥特

translation.en: Connections like that aren't made every day.
translation.zh: 这样的联系不是每天都会有

translation.en: This dog loves your son.
translation.zh: 这只狗很爱你的儿子

translation.en: She's been crying ever since he left.
translation.zh: 他走之后她一直在哭

translation.en: And look, I don't want to tell you how to parent
translation.zh: 听着 我不是想告诉你怎么做父母因为我没有经验

translation.en: because I have no experience with it,
translation.zh: 我不是想告诉你怎么做父母因为我没有经验

translation.en: I've never parented anything other than the dogs
translation.zh: 除了我每年养的狗 我从来没有

translation.en: that I foster every year.
translation.zh: 抚养过任何东西

translation.en: But I think in order to learn responsibility,
translation.zh: 但是 我认为为了学会承担责任

translation.en: you have to be given responsibility.
translation.zh: 你必须被赋予责任

translation.en: And that applies to the kids here, right?
translation.zh: 这也适用于这里的孩子 对吧？

translation.en: Please, Dad, I promise I'll take good care of her.
translation.zh: 拜托 爸爸 我保证我会照顾好她

translation.en: Pretty, pretty, pretty please.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: You can even take back our--
translation.zh: 你可以收回我们的…

translation.en: Oh, sorry, I mean, Elliot's shares of the presents back
translation.zh: 抱歉 我是说要是我们能得到这只小狗

translation.en: if we can just have this one puppy.
translation.zh: 你可以收回埃利奥特的礼物

translation.en: Please, Daddy, please.
translation.zh: 拜托 爸爸 拜托

translation.en: I mean, you show up on my doorstep here
translation.zh: 你就这样出现在门口 还带着…

translation.en: with this fuzzy little bit of cuteness with a bow on and everything.
translation.zh: 这毛茸茸有点可爱戴着蝴蝶结的小家伙

translation.en: It's not like I ever really had a choice, huh.
translation.zh: 我也没得选

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 -谢谢-谢谢 爸爸

translation.en: BOTH: Yay! Thank you, Daddy!
translation.zh: -谢谢-谢谢 爸爸

translation.en: Give me the papers and let me sign
translation.zh: 在我改变主意之前

translation.en: on the dotted line before I change my mind.
translation.zh: 把文件拿给我签吧

translation.en: Ready for you right there.
translation.zh: -已经准备好了-的确

translation.en: Yes, you are. Well, last step is you guys have to name her.
translation.zh: 最后一步是你们要给她取名字

translation.en: Yeah, Elliot. What you gonna name her?
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 你要叫她什么？

translation.en: Belle. Her name is Belle.
translation.zh: 贝儿 她的名字是贝儿

translation.en: Oh, what do we have going on here?
translation.zh: 这里是怎么回事？

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Bless you.
translation.zh: 上帝保佑

translation.en: Oh, you must be the neighbor and you adopted a dog, isn't that nice?
translation.zh: 你一定是邻居你领养了只狗 真不错啊

translation.en: Nope, she's ours for the keeping.
translation.zh: 不 她是我们家的狗

translation.en: And you're allergic, ain't you?
translation.zh: 你过敏 不是吗？

translation.en: Glenn, please tell me that you did not adopt a dog
translation.zh: 格林 请告诉我你没有从一个陌生人

translation.en: from a complete stranger.
translation.zh: 那里领养一只狗

translation.en: I mean, no offense, you seem lovely.
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 你看着是个好人

translation.en: She's not a stranger.
translation.zh: 她不是陌生人

translation.en: And Belle isn't a random dog.
translation.zh: 贝儿也不是随便什么狗

translation.en: Are you, Belle?
translation.zh: 是吧 贝儿

translation.en: She's part of our family now.
translation.zh: 她现在是我们的家人了

translation.en: Dani, this is the director of the local dog rescue here in town.
translation.zh: 丹妮 这是镇上狗狗救助站的负责人

translation.en: We actually met yesterday,
translation.zh: 我们昨天见过

translation.en: actually right outside your bakery.
translation.zh: 就在你们烘焙店门口

translation.en: I'm Kate.
translation.zh: 我是凯特

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你-上帝保佑

translation.en: This is Dani and Dani is--
translation.zh: 这是丹妮 丹妮是… 我们无家可归的假日客人

translation.en: Our homeless holiday guest.
translation.zh: 我们无家可归的假日客人

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You are allergic to dogs, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你对狗过敏吗？

translation.en: Mm-hmm, yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Oh, to the fur, to their drool, to the feces, all of it.
translation.zh: 对皮毛 唾液 粪便 对一切都过敏

translation.en: GLENN: I had no idea.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: But, you know, actually they have shots now
translation.zh: 但事实上现在有这种疫苗

translation.en: for that and they're pretty simple, so--
translation.zh: 而且很简单 所以…

translation.en: I'm gonna get going
translation.zh: 真的吗？ 我要走了 不过我可以把名片给你

translation.en: but I'm gonna give you my card.
translation.zh: 我要走了 不过我可以把名片给你

translation.en: It has my cell number on it. Call me anytime if you need anything.
translation.zh: 上面有我的手机号有什么需要随时给我打电话

translation.en: All of her papers and she's got all of her shots.
translation.zh: 她所有的文件她已经打过了所有疫苗

translation.en: The number for the vet is on there
translation.zh: 兽医的电话就在上面

translation.en: and there's an after-hours emergency,
translation.zh: 还有下班后的紧急需要

translation.en: just in case something goes wrong.
translation.zh: 以防万一

translation.en: Perfect. That's great, thank you so very much.
translation.zh: 完美 真是好极了 非常感谢

translation.en: Yes, thank you, thank you, Kate.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 凯特

translation.en: You are so welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Kate.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 凯特

translation.en: Enjoy Belle. We will.
translation.zh: -和贝儿玩得开心-我们会的

translation.en: Take good care of her.
translation.zh: 照顾好她

translation.en: Okay. I appreciate it, Kate.
translation.zh: -好-感谢你 凯特

translation.en: Thank you, thank you very, very much. Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢 非常感谢-谢谢你

translation.en: Bye, guys, nice meeting you.
translation.zh: -再见了 很高兴见到你们-是啊

translation.en: Okay, girl, let's get you something to eat.
translation.zh: 好了 我们去给你弄吃的

translation.en: I bet you're starving. Elliot, you can't just feed her anything, okay?
translation.zh: -我猜你肯定饿了-埃利奥特 你不能随便喂她吃的

translation.en: She can't have chocolate.
translation.zh: 好吗 她不能吃巧克力

translation.en: She can't have onions...
translation.zh: 她不能吃洋葱…

translation.en: Hey, bud.
translation.zh: 伙计

translation.en: Everything okay with Dani?
translation.zh: 和丹妮相处得愉快吗？

translation.en: Well, at least she stopped crying.
translation.zh: 至少她不哭了

translation.en: Belle makes you pretty happy, doesn't she?
translation.zh: 贝儿让你很开心 是吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think I've seen you this
translation.zh: 是的 我很久没看到

translation.en: consistently happy in a long time.
translation.zh: 你这样开心了

translation.en: Belle is so happy all the time.
translation.zh: 贝儿一直都很开心

translation.en: I've got to work hard to keep up, you know.
translation.zh: 我要努力跟上

translation.en: And I've been telling Belle all about mom.
translation.zh: 我在跟贝儿讲妈妈的事

translation.en: How she was the most amazing architect ever
translation.zh: 她是最棒的建筑师

translation.en: and how we used to lay on the floor of her study and draw pictures
translation.zh: 我们以前常常趴在她的书房画画

translation.en: while she would work on blueprints at her desk.
translation.zh: 而她在画蓝图

translation.en: You don't think mom's starting to think that I forgot about her
translation.zh: 你不觉得妈妈会因为贝儿让我这么开心

translation.en: because Belle makes me so happy?
translation.zh: 而开始以为我忘了她吧？

translation.en: No, no, no way, buddy, no way.
translation.zh: 不 不可能 小伙子 不可能

translation.en: Your mom, she is watching down on you.

translation.en: And every single time that you or your sister smile,
