translation.en: She's barely the size of a cat.
translation.zh: 她跟猫差不多大

translation.en: It was a very small cat, a kitten.
translation.zh: 那是只非常小的猫 一只小猫

translation.en: Now are you sure we're talking about the same dog,
translation.zh: 你确定你说的是这只狗

translation.en: this dog right here?
translation.zh: 就在这里这只狗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, don't be deceived by her charms, Mister.
translation.zh: 是的 别被她的魅力欺骗了 先生

translation.en: I am telling you, this dog is a killer.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 这狗是个杀手

translation.en: She even killed some birds.
translation.zh: 她还杀了一些鸟

translation.en: Yep, in my backyard, she killed these, like, parrots,
translation.zh: 在我的后花园里 她杀了鹦鹉 麻雀之类的

translation.en: sparrow-looking things.
translation.zh: 她杀了鹦鹉 麻雀之类的

translation.en: A bird killer, huh?
translation.zh: 鸟类杀手 是吧？

translation.en: Well, I might just have to move this one to the top of my list.
translation.zh: 我可能要把它放到名单第一位了

translation.en: Wonderful. How soon can it be done?
translation.zh: -好极了 多久能搞定-星期天早上

translation.en: Sunday morning, on account we're closed for Christmas.
translation.zh: -好极了 多久能搞定-星期天早上 因为圣诞节我们不上班

translation.en: Well, but you said humanely, right?
translation.zh: 但你说的是人道 对吧？

translation.en: I mean, I don't want her to suffer or anything.
translation.zh: 我不想让她受苦之类的

translation.en: Belle?
translation.zh: 贝儿？

translation.en: Belle?
translation.zh: 贝儿？

translation.en: Belle!
translation.zh: 贝儿！

translation.en: Where do you think you're going?
translation.zh: 你以为你要去哪里？

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: I'm not covering you for this time and you will be totally busted.
translation.zh: 这次我不掩护你了你会被彻底逮个正着

translation.en: Why am I the only sane person in my family?
translation.zh: 为什么我是家里唯一理智的人？

translation.en: Belle.
translation.zh: -贝儿-贝儿

translation.en: Belle.
translation.zh: -贝儿-贝儿

translation.en: Belle.
translation.zh: 贝儿

translation.en: Come here, Belle. Come here, Belle.
translation.zh: 来啊 贝儿

translation.en: Hey, guys, no luck yet?
translation.zh: -孩子们 还是没有-不

translation.en: No, come on. Let's you and I go this way and you guys go that way.
translation.zh: 来吧 你和我走这边 你们走那边

translation.en: Okay, fine, but do not go on the road
translation.zh: 来吧 你和我走这边 你们走那边 好吧 但除非看到贝儿否则别上路 好吗？

translation.en: unless you see Belle, okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 但除非看到贝儿否则别上路 好吗？

translation.en: Don't leave our subdivision. Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -别离开我们的小区-是 长官

translation.en: Belle. Belle.
translation.zh: -贝儿-贝儿

translation.en: Thank God you're back.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地你回来了

translation.en: I don't know how to ice this thing.
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么冰这东西

translation.en: Don't worry, I have it all under control.
translation.zh: 别担心 一切尽在掌控

translation.en: And the little dog too?
translation.zh: 那只小狗也是吗？

translation.en: I told you, everything.
translation.zh: 我说了是一切

translation.en: So you, like, killed it?
translation.zh: 所以你杀了它？

translation.en: No, I didn't kill it. Oh.
translation.zh: 不 我没有杀它

translation.en: What kind of a monster do you take me for?
translation.zh: 你以为我是什么怪物？

translation.en: I took it to be euthanized. Oh.
translation.zh: 我把它送去安乐死了

translation.en: Oh!
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So I've exactly one hour to get this cake tiered into confection perfection
translation.zh: 我还有整一个小时把蛋糕做成完美的样子

translation.en: and then I got to pick up the kids and Glenn,
translation.zh: 然后我要去接孩子们和格伦

translation.en: hold them for about five minutes
translation.zh: 抱着他们五分钟

translation.en: while they cry over the untimely disappearance of their little mutt
translation.zh: 在他们为自己的小狗突然失踪而哭泣时

translation.en: and then bring them back here in time for the contest,
translation.zh: 然后及时带他们回来参加比赛

translation.en: where they can have a nice big piece of my red velvet cake.
translation.zh: 他们可以在比赛时大吃一大块我的红丝绒蛋糕

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Elliot, we should turn back.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 我们该回去了

translation.en: Maybe we passed her,
translation.zh: 也许我们错过了

translation.en: or maybe your dad and Phoebe found her by now.
translation.zh: 或者现在你爸爸和菲比已经找到了

translation.en: Hey, look, we're gonna find her, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 我们要找到她 好吗？

translation.en: I will help you look for her every day until we do.
translation.zh: 我会每天帮你找她直到找到为止

translation.en: I pinky promise.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: Okay, come on. Let's get back to the house.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们回去吧

translation.en: Belle. Belle.
translation.zh: -贝儿-贝儿

translation.en: GLENN: Hi, Kate, this is Glenn Barrows. I'm calling about Belle.
translation.zh: 凯特 我是格林巴罗斯我打这个电话是因为贝儿

translation.en: It seems that she's gone missing and we can't find her anywhere.
translation.zh: 她好像走丢了 我们哪都找不到

translation.en: Could you please give me a call as soon as you get this message?
translation.zh: 你收到消息后能不能给我打个电话

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Elliot, did you ask Malcolm
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 你问过马尔科姆

translation.en: if he saw any sign of Belle this afternoon?
translation.zh: 他下午有没有看到贝儿吗？

translation.en: His mom said he had to call back
translation.zh: 他妈妈说他要在吃完

translation.en: after they finished Christmas dinner.
translation.zh: 圣诞晚餐后再回电话

translation.en: Dad, we have to find her. I know, honey.
translation.zh: -爸爸 我们要找到她-我知道 亲爱的

translation.en: But there's nothing more that we can do right now.
translation.zh: 但现在我们也没办法

translation.en: I still can't figure out how she got out the front door.
translation.zh: 我还是不知道她怎么出去的

translation.en: I was sure we closed it.
translation.zh: 我确定我们关好了门

translation.en: DANI: Hey. How's it going?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Are we all ready to go have some delicious Christmas treats?
translation.zh: 准备好去吃美味的圣诞大餐了吗？

translation.en: Oh, why the long faces?
translation.zh: 为什么都拉长了脸？

translation.en: It's Belle, she went missing this afternoon.
translation.zh: 是贝儿 她下午不见了 我们找不到她

translation.en: We can't find her anywhere.
translation.zh: 她下午不见了 我们找不到她

translation.en: Oh, that's just terrible.
translation.zh: 那真是太糟了

translation.en: Oh, well-- do you have any idea where she could be?
translation.zh: 你知道她可能去哪儿吗？

translation.en: GLENN: No, we've been up and down the block twice.
translation.zh: 不 我们上上下下找了两遍

translation.en: We've asked everybody, nobody has seen any sign of her.
translation.zh: 我们问了每个人 没人见过她

translation.en: Maybe if you guys go to the square, you could ask around,
translation.zh: 或许你们可以去广场问问

translation.en: maybe somebody has seen her running around?
translation.zh: 也许会有人见过它

translation.en: That's not a bad idea.
translation.zh: 这主意不错

translation.en: But, Dad, I don't want to go to the square.
translation.zh: 但是爸爸 我不想去广场

translation.en: If Belle comes back, I have to be here.
translation.zh: 要是贝儿回来了呢 我想留在这里

translation.en: Listen, I'm sure she's fine.
translation.zh: 听着 我保证她没事 我保证我们会找到她

translation.en: I'm sure we'll find her.
translation.zh: 我保证她没事 我保证我们会找到她

translation.en: Let's just go up to the square and see,
translation.zh: 我们去广场看看

translation.en: maybe she's been running around up there.
translation.zh: 也许她就在那边呢

translation.en: You're wasting your breath, lady.
translation.zh: 你在白费口舌 女士

translation.en: We ain't moving till Belle's back.
translation.zh: 在贝儿回来之前我们哪儿都不去

translation.en: Glenn, here.
translation.zh: 格林

translation.en: Listen, why don't we just leave the kids here?
translation.zh: 听着 不如就让孩子们留下来

translation.en: You could call Marnie and she could watch them.
translation.zh: 你可以打电话给玛妮她可以照顾他们

translation.en: You know, 'cause this is my thing,
translation.zh: 你可以打电话给玛妮她可以照顾他们 因为今晚对我很重要 我必须去那儿

translation.en: I got to be there tonight.
translation.zh: 因为今晚对我很重要 我必须去那儿

translation.en: I know that but, Marnie, that's not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 我知道但是玛妮来不了

translation.en: She has this midnight mass with the lady she does every year.
translation.zh: 她每年都会去做午夜弥撒

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Guys, see what she's wearing?
translation.zh: 你们看到她的穿着了吗？

translation.en: She wasn't wearing that this morning.
translation.zh: 她和早上穿的不一样

translation.en: She's obviously been back to change since we left.
translation.zh: 她和早上穿的不一样 她在我们离开后回来换过衣服

translation.en: Bet she's the one who left the door open on purpose.
translation.zh: 她一定是故意没关门

translation.en: [clears throat] Guys, listen.
translation.zh: 孩子们 听着

translation.en: Why don't we go to the square
translation.zh: 不如我们去广场

translation.en: and we can put up some missing puppy flyers.
translation.zh: 然后贴些小狗走丢传单

translation.en: Okay, and then in the morning I promise you,
translation.zh: 然后我保证明天早上

translation.en: we will go out and we will look for Belle again.
translation.zh: 我们就出去找贝儿

translation.en: But, Dad, if Belle comes back, I have to be here.
translation.zh: 但是爸爸 要是贝儿回来了呢 我要留在这里

translation.en: Oh, Elliot, that's just not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 那是不可能的

translation.en: I mean, she's a puppy. They're not that smart.
translation.zh: 她是只狗 没那么从聪明

translation.en: Who knows where she could be?
translation.zh: 谁知道她去哪儿了？

translation.en: I bet you know exactly where she is.
translation.zh: 我赌你肯定知道

translation.en: I'm sorry?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You took Belle. We know it was you.
translation.zh: 你带走了贝儿 我们知道是你

translation.en: Phoebe, honey, it's pretty obvious
translation.zh: 菲比 亲爱的 很显然

translation.en: that Belle went out the open front door.
translation.zh: 贝儿是从前门出去了

translation.en: Probably because she left it open.
translation.zh: 可能是因为她故意没关门

translation.en: I mean, you got to admit,
translation.zh: 你必须承认

translation.en: it would be a lot easier for her to reach the front door handle
translation.zh: 她动门把手

translation.en: than it would be for Belle to, that's for darn sure.
translation.zh: 可比贝儿容易多了 那是一定的

translation.en: Phoebe, I haven't been here today. Okay?
translation.zh: 菲比 我今天都没在这里 好吗？

translation.en: I mean, I left the house before you did this morning.
translation.zh: 我在你们出门前就走了

translation.en: Yeah? Well, you weren't wearing that tacky dress the first time you left.
translation.zh: 是吗 你第一次出门穿的可不是这条俗气的群众

translation.en: Listen, I went to my house
translation.zh: 听着 我去了我家

translation.en: and I changed my clothes this afternoon, okay?
translation.zh: 然后换了衣服 好吗？

translation.en: That's a lie.
translation.zh: 说谎

translation.en: I saw that ugly thing the first night
translation.zh: 第一天晚上我在检查你的包里

translation.en: when I was checking your bags for narcotics and firearms.
translation.zh: 有没有毒品和枪支的时候就看到了这条丑裙子

translation.en: You went through my suitcase?
translation.zh: 你翻了我的箱子？

translation.en: Phoebe, we do not go through other people's private belongings.
translation.zh: 菲比 我们不能乱动别人的私人物品

translation.en: You know better than that, young lady.
translation.zh: 你很清楚 女士

translation.en: Dad, she doesn't even care about us.
translation.zh: 爸爸 她根本不在乎我们

translation.en: She just wants you because you're a hot catch
translation.zh: 她只是想要你 因为你是抢手货

translation.en: and you have lots of money.
translation.zh: 你有很多钱

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 你有很多钱 够了 菲比 现在就跟丹妮道歉

translation.en: Phoebe, apologize to Dani right now.
translation.zh: 够了 菲比 现在就跟丹妮道歉

translation.en: No, Dad. Phoebe's right.
translation.zh: 不 爸爸 菲比说得对

translation.en: Dani did something to Belle.
translation.zh: 丹妮对贝儿做了什么

translation.en: Just look at her, it's written all over her face.
translation.zh: 看看她 都写在脸上了

translation.en: Elliot, you are not helping. And neither are you.
translation.zh: -埃利奥特 你在帮倒忙-你也一样

translation.en: You're being blindsided by that big-headed blonde.
translation.zh: 你被那个大头金发女给骗了

translation.en: Guys, what is wrong with you?
translation.zh: 孩子们 你们是怎么了？

translation.en: Knock it off.
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: Do you know that Dani lost her mother at Christmas, too?
translation.zh: 你们知道丹妮也在圣诞节失去了母亲吗？

translation.en: You need to think about other people's feelings too.
translation.zh: 你们也要考虑别人的感受

translation.en: Maybe the holidays are tough for other people as well.
translation.zh: 也许节日对别人来说也很难过

translation.en: But, Dad, she-- No, but nothing, Elliot.
translation.zh: -但是爸爸-不 别说了 埃利奥特

translation.en: Okay, Belle is gone right now,
translation.zh: -但是爸爸-不 别说了 埃利奥特 贝儿现在不见了

translation.en: there's nothing we can do about it.
translation.zh: 我们没有办法

translation.en: But if we're gonna accuse somebody of doing something,
translation.zh: 但我们要指责别人

translation.en: you need to have evidence.
translation.zh: 就要有证据

translation.en: All right, then tomorrow like I said,
translation.zh: 好了 就像我说的

translation.en: we will go and we will look for Belle.
translation.zh: 明天我们会去找贝儿

translation.en: In the meantime, you guys are making me wonder
translation.zh: 与此同时 你们让我开始怀疑

translation.en: whether you were ever responsible enough
translation.zh: 你们本身是否有足够的责任感

translation.en: to have adopted this dog in the first place.
translation.zh: 去收养这只狗

translation.en: Dani, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, Dani.
translation.zh: 丹妮

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: -丹妮-不

translation.en: Hey, hey, I am so sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: The kids, they didn't mean the stuff that they were saying, they didn't.
translation.zh: 孩子们 他们不是故意的 真的

translation.en: They just--
translation.zh: 他们只是 我觉得他们对狗狗这件事太难过

translation.en: I think they're just taking this whole dog thing so hard
translation.zh: 我觉得他们对狗狗这件事太难过

translation.en: because they really just miss their mom.
translation.zh: 是因为他们真的很想妈妈

translation.en: They do.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: And your bakery contest thing, it sounds like a lot of fun.
translation.zh: 你的烘焙比赛 听起来很有趣

translation.en: I get it. It's just--
translation.zh: 我明白 只是…

translation.en: It's that I told all my co-workers
translation.zh: 我告诉了我所有的同事

translation.en: that they were gonna meet this really great guy, you know.
translation.zh: 他们将会见到一个很棒的人

translation.en: And it's all right, I'll just be by myself.
translation.zh: 好吧 我自己去

translation.en: Okay, I'll just be all alone,
translation.zh: 好吧 我就一个人

translation.en: by myself like I always am, I'm very used to it, it's okay.
translation.zh: 就像以往那样 我很习惯了 没事

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: -没事-丹妮

translation.en: Oh, I feel terrible,
translation.zh: 我感觉很糟糕

translation.en: but what else can I do?
translation.zh: 但我能这么做

translation.en: The kids won't go anywhere without Belle
translation.zh: 孩子们没有贝儿哪也不去

translation.en: and I can't leave them here alone.
translation.zh: 我不能留他们自己在家

translation.en: Well, I mean, if you came with me for just a little bit,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你能和我一起去

translation.en: then you could put up those signs.
translation.zh: 也不是不可以

translation.en: I know somebody who could look after them.
translation.zh: 我知道有谁可以照顾他们

translation.en: All right. Listen up.
translation.zh: 好了 太好了

translation.en: You will do exactly as I say
translation.zh: 你们要照我说的做

translation.en: or I will call the evil little elves to come and get you and take you away
translation.zh: 否则我就叫邪恶的小精灵来抓你们把你们带走

translation.en: where you will be fed nothing but clear colored snow cones without sugar
translation.zh: 在那里你们将只吃无色的不加糖的甜筒

translation.en: and placed on an assembly line making fun toys for everyone
translation.zh: 被放在一条装配线上全年为所有人制造有趣的玩具

translation.en: but yourselves year round, got it?
translation.zh: 你们自己却没有 明白吗？

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Now do you have any caramel glaze in the kitchen?
translation.zh: 厨房里有焦糖釉吗？

translation.en: Guys, we can't just sit here.
translation.zh: 伙计们 我们不能就坐在这里

translation.en: Belle has to be out there somewhere right now
translation.zh: 贝儿现在就在外面

translation.en: and might really need our help.
translation.zh: 可能需要我们的帮助

translation.en: Well, what do you expect us to do?
translation.zh: 你想我们怎么做？

translation.en: Cheesecake monster over there
translation.zh: 那边的奶酪蛋糕怪物肯定不会

translation.en: sure isn't gonna let us out of her sights anytime soon.
translation.zh: 让我们在短时间内离开她的视线

translation.en: I know. We just have to figure out a way to get out of here.
translation.zh: 我知道 我们需要想办法离开这里

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: It's for you.
translation.zh: 找你的

translation.en: Make it quick.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Is it Dad? Did they find Belle?
translation.zh: 是爸爸吗？他们找到贝儿了？

translation.en: Not now.
translation.zh: 还没有

translation.en: Sorry, Hambone. I was eating turkey.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我刚才在吃火鸡

translation.en: My mom says you called earlier.
translation.zh: 我妈妈说你打过电话

translation.en: It's Belle, we can't find her.
translation.zh: 是贝儿 找不到了

translation.en: What do you mean you can't find her?
translation.zh: 找不到了什么意思？

translation.en: She was gone tonight when we got home.
translation.zh: 在我们回家前她走丢了

translation.en: And the front door was open.
translation.zh: 前门开着

translation.en: You didn't see her outside, did you?
translation.zh: 你没在外面看到她吗？

translation.en: Nope, but I did see that big-headed blonde over there
translation.zh: 没有 但今天下午早些时候我看到了那个大头金发女

translation.en: earlier this afternoon when I was giving Penny Reiner
translation.zh: 但今天下午早些时候我看到了那个大头金发女 在我用我的黑猫鞭炮

translation.en: a Christmas Eve scare
translation.zh: 在我用我的黑猫鞭炮

translation.en: with my stampede string of Black Cats.
translation.zh: 给佩妮莱纳平安夜惊喜时

translation.en: She was here this afternoon?
translation.zh: 她下午在这里

translation.en: Um, I mean, you saw Belle where?
translation.zh: 你看到贝儿了吗？

translation.en: I said I saw the big-headed blonde.
translation.zh: 我说我看到了那个大头金发女

translation.en: Yeah, I heard what you said,
translation.zh: 我听到了

translation.en: but we actually can't go looking for Belle right now unfortunately,
translation.zh: 但我们现在没法去找贝儿

translation.en: because my dad is not here and we've a sitter.
translation.zh: 因为我爸爸不在 这里有个保姆

translation.en: You have a sitter?
translation.zh: 你们有个保姆

translation.en: Yeah, a friend of my dad's new girlfriend,
translation.zh: 我爸爸新女友的朋友

translation.en: she's really nice too.
translation.zh: 她也很恶劣

translation.en: Dude, you're freaking me out.
translation.zh: 伙计 你吓到我了

translation.en: Are you in trouble or something?
translation.zh: 你们有麻烦了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we're pretty bummed about Belle too, but sure,
translation.zh: 是啊 贝儿的事我们很难过 不过当然我觉得你能早点送我

translation.en: an early Christmas gift from you actually
translation.zh: 不过当然我觉得你能早点送我 圣诞礼物会让我精神振奋

translation.en: would lift my spirits, I think.
translation.zh: 圣诞礼物会让我精神振奋

translation.en: Name the gift and Santa will deliver.
translation.zh: 说出礼物的名字圣诞老人就会送出礼物

translation.en: Hey, no visitors tonight, okay?
translation.zh: 今晚不能有客人 好吗？

translation.en: The babysitter says you can't bring it tonight, though.
translation.zh: 等等 保姆说你今晚不能过来

translation.en: Santa don't wait for no sitter.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人不会等保姆

translation.en: Wait, what's that?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？

translation.en: You got me the same thing you got Penny Reiner?
translation.zh: 你给我的东西和给佩妮赖纳的一样

translation.en: Wow, thanks, Malcolm.
translation.zh: 谢谢 马尔科姆

translation.en: I love that awesome collection of, um, cat stamps.
translation.zh: 我喜欢那套超棒的 猫咪邮票

translation.en: Operation Jingle Belle Jailbreak
translation.zh: 叮当越狱计划

translation.en: is in T-minus ten minutes and counting.
translation.zh: 倒计时十分钟

translation.en: So Malcolm said he thought
translation.zh: 马尔科姆说他

translation.en: he saw Belle in Mr. Polinsky's backyard.
translation.zh: 他在波林斯基先生的后院看到了贝儿

translation.en: Really? You can see their backyard from your room upstairs.
translation.zh: 真的吗？ 你可以从楼上的房间看到他们的后院

translation.en: I know, let's go.
translation.zh: 我知道 我们走吧

translation.en: Belle!
translation.zh: 贝儿！

translation.en: Belle, if you can hear me, wave one paw in the light.
translation.zh: 贝儿 听到了 对着光挥动爪子

translation.en: Sorry, kids, but your dog is not down in that yard.
translation.zh: 抱歉 孩子们 但你们的狗不在那院子里

translation.en: Well, guess it's a good thing.
translation.zh: 我猜那是好事

translation.en: I was just worried about what Mr. Polinsky swore
translation.zh: 我只是担心波林斯基先生发誓过

translation.en: he would do if he ever caught our dog in his backyard.
translation.zh: 如果他在后院抓到我们的狗他会怎么做

translation.en: What did he swear he would do?
translation.zh: 他发誓他会做什么？

translation.en: Well, he said he would take his. 22 rifle
translation.zh: 他说他会拿着他的 二十二步枪直接开火

translation.en: and open fire on our front lawn.
translation.zh: 二十二步枪直接开火

translation.en: But, Elliot, I always thought Mr. Polinsky was so nice.
translation.zh: 但是 埃利奥特我一直觉得波林斯基先生很好

translation.en: Oh, the craziest ones usually are.
translation.zh: 最疯狂的人通常都是这样

translation.en: Mal--
translation.zh: 马尔…

translation.en: Your neighbor, he sounds like a real loony.
translation.zh: 你的邻居 听起来像个疯子

translation.en: If I were you, I'd move away
translation.zh: 如果我是你们 我会在他决定

translation.en: before he decides to blow this whole neighborhood.
translation.zh: 炸掉整个社区之前搬走

translation.en: Kids, get down! Mr. Polinsky's gone postal!
translation.zh: 孩子们 趴下 波林斯基先生疯了

translation.en: Elliot, I'll meet you outside.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 我在外面等你

translation.en: Hurry, hurry.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Rug rats?
translation.zh: 老鼠们？

translation.en: Any of you still alive?
translation.zh: 你们还活着吗？

translation.en: Wow. Good job, Elliot.
translation.zh: 干得好 埃利奥特

translation.en: What? You guys tricked me!
translation.zh: 什么？你们骗我的！

translation.en: Yeah, and if you make even so much as one peep while we're gone,
translation.zh: 是 我们走的时候 如果你敢偷看

translation.en: I'll call Santa and you'll be forced to shovel
translation.zh: 我就给圣诞老人打电话

translation.en: reindeer poop for an eternity.
translation.zh: 你就得永远被逼着去铲驯鹿的便便

translation.en: So what's next?
translation.zh: 下一步怎么做？

translation.en: Elliot's calling us a ride.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特在给我们叫车

translation.en: But where are we going?
translation.zh: 但是我们要去哪儿？

translation.en: We're going to save Belle. Come on.
translation.zh: 我们要去救贝尔

translation.en: Oh, God, what's taking Grandma so long?
translation.zh: 上帝啊 外婆怎么这么久？

translation.en: So I hear my merry mischief makers need a little lift into town.
translation.zh: 我听说我的小捣蛋们需要搭个顺风车进城

translation.en: It's like a fallen ice skater's frostbit bottom out there.
translation.zh: 就像滑冰的人摔倒了

translation.en: Are you kids getting in or what?
translation.zh: 你们要上车吗？

translation.en: Okay, so now what?
translation.zh: 好了 现在怎么做？

translation.en: We need to get inside the bakery and find Dani's purse.
translation.zh: 我们得进面包店找到丹妮的钱包

translation.en: What do we need from her purse?
translation.zh: 我们要她的钱包做什么？

translation.en: Her address and her keys.
translation.zh: 她的地址和钥匙

translation.en: If she took Belle, that's where she will be.
translation.zh: 要是她带走了贝儿那贝儿就应该在那儿

translation.en: Wait. What if we run into Dani or your dad moving through all these people?
translation.zh: 等等 如果我们在人群中碰到丹妮或者你爸爸怎么办？

translation.en: We'll be totally busted.
translation.zh: 我们就完了

translation.en: Good point.
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: Phoebe, let's get eyes on Dani and Dad, will you?
translation.zh: 菲比 我们要小心丹妮和爸爸 明白吗？

translation.en: Yeah, all right.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: Excuse me, Mister, I'm having a hard time locating my father.
translation.zh: 不好意思 先生 我找不到我爸爸了

translation.en: Can I trouble you for an elevator ride up to your top floor?
translation.zh: 我能麻烦你抱我一下吗？

translation.en: Well, sure, kid, and while you're up there,
translation.zh: 当然了 孩子 你不妨

translation.en: why don't you see if they've got a Danish.
translation.zh: 顺便看看还有没有丹麦曲奇

translation.en: I think they're gonna run out before I can get to the table.
translation.zh: 我在想是不是等我过去就已经没有了 好的

translation.en: Okay. Now, so you know...
translation.zh: 你们知道…

translation.en: Oh, yeah, there's a big plate of them.
translation.zh: 还有一大盘呢

translation.en: ...I will make. Yay!
translation.zh: …我要做！

translation.en: All right, now the line starts right here, right by Santa.
translation.zh: 现在从这边开始排队在圣诞老人这里

translation.en: Man down, man down.
translation.zh: 放我下来

translation.en: Did she see you?
translation.zh: 她看到你了吗？ 我想没有

translation.en: No, I don't think so, and we're clear if we go around back.
translation.zh: 我想没有 我们可以绕过去

translation.en: Dad and Dani are at the front.
translation.zh: 爸爸和丹妮在前面

translation.en: Phoebe, wait. Where are you going?
translation.zh: 菲比 等等 你要去哪儿？

translation.en: Don't worry, just get the keys and address.
translation.zh: 别担心 只是去拿钥匙和地址

translation.en: I'll meet around back in ten minutes.
translation.zh: 我们十分钟后在那边见

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Oh, this cheesecake is amazing.
translation.zh: 这个芝士蛋糕真好吃

translation.en: Oh, I made the red velvet.
translation.zh: 我做的是红丝绒蛋糕

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's not bad either.
translation.zh: 是的 那也不错

translation.en: It's so good. Thank you.
translation.zh: 很好吃 谢谢

translation.en: Oh. Oh, you got a bunch right here.
translation.zh: 你这里沾了一点

translation.en: Your-- let me see, yeah.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我… -我很抱歉 我马上回来-没事

translation.en: Bingo.
translation.zh: 来对了

translation.en: Bingo.
translation.zh: 来对了

translation.en: I think I have it.
translation.zh: 我想我找到了

translation.en: 5217 Spicewood Road.
translation.zh: 香料木路5217号

translation.en: Got them.
translation.zh: 拿到了

translation.en: Someone's coming.
translation.zh: 有人来了

translation.en: Hide!
translation.zh: 藏起来

translation.en: Kate, hi. Thanks for calling me back.
translation.zh: 凯特 谢谢回我电话

translation.en: KATE: Sorry, I've been so busy with Christmas stuff.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我在忙圣诞节的事

translation.en: Have you guys found Belle?
translation.zh: 你们找到贝儿了吗？ 没有 很不幸我们还没找到她

translation.en: No, no, we have not yet, unfortunately.
translation.zh: 没有 很不幸我们还没找到她

translation.en: I'll come right over and help you guys look.
translation.zh: 我会过来帮你们一起找

translation.en: Yeah, I'd like that.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢

translation.en: Great. I'll be at the house in 15.
translation.zh: 太好了 我15分钟后到你家

translation.en: We can drive the kids around to find her.
translation.zh: 我们可以带上孩子们去找她

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: Run!
translation.zh: 跑！

translation.en: Aah! You mischievous little mongrels!
translation.zh: 你们这些淘气的小杂种！

translation.en: I don't know if you think you know what you're up to,
translation.zh: 我不知道你们是否知道自己在做什么

translation.en: but I can promise you, you won't get away with it!
translation.zh: 但我保证你们逃不掉

translation.en: Is everything all right? Oh, it's just all powdered sugar.
translation.zh: -没事吧？-都是糖粉

translation.en: Yeah, I can see that.
translation.zh: 我看得出来

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: 'Cause-- Oh, I'll be right back.
translation.zh: -因为…-我马上回来

translation.en: Wait, wait, Dani, Dani, wait.
translation.zh: 等等 丹妮 等等

translation.en: I really need to get back for the kids
translation.zh: 我需要回去接孩子们

translation.en: 'cause they're gonna be so worried about Belle.
translation.zh: 因为他们太担心贝儿了

translation.en: Do you need to go clean up or do you mind if I go back?
translation.zh: 你要清理下吗 不介意我回去下吧？

translation.en: No, no, you just-- you go on home.
translation.zh: 不 你 你回去吧

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: I'm sure the kids will be waiting for you with bells on.
translation.zh: 我相信孩子们一定会兴奋地等着你

translation.en: Well, just call me when you want me to come pick you up. I'll just be a bit.
translation.zh: -需要我来接你的时候就给我打电话-我还要一会儿

translation.en: Okay. Give me a call then.
translation.zh: 好吧 到时候给我电话

translation.en: That was a close call.
translation.zh: 差一点

translation.en: That was awesome.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Phoebe, where have you been?
translation.zh: 菲比 你去哪儿了

translation.en: Found Dad's car down on the street corner,
translation.zh: 在街角发现了爸爸的车

translation.en: swiped his GPS.
translation.zh: 拿了他的导航

translation.en: How else were we gonna go to Dani's house?
translation.zh: 不然我们怎么去丹妮家

translation.en: You're a genius.
translation.zh: 你真是天才

translation.en: Okay, it's only four blocks from here.
translation.zh: 好的 离这里只有四个街区

translation.en: We need to go that way.
translation.zh: 我们需要从那边走

translation.en: Wait. How did you get into a locked car?
translation.zh: 等下 你怎么进上锁了的车的？

translation.en: Where there's a woman, there's a way.
translation.zh: 女人总是 有办法

translation.en: Hey, Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: Bet you're wondering why I'm out here all alone at night without Dad, huh?
translation.zh: 我猜你一定很奇怪为什么我一个人晚上在这里没有和爸爸一起

translation.en: Well, don't worry too much.
translation.zh: 不要太担心

translation.en: I'm not in too much trouble.
translation.zh: 我没有遇到大麻烦

translation.en: Well, yet anyway.
translation.zh: 还没有

translation.en: You see, Dad let us adopt this dog and I named her Belle,
translation.zh: 爸爸让我们领养了一只狗狗 我给她起名贝儿

translation.en: and she's this adorable, cream colored shepherd
translation.zh: 她是一只可爱的奶油色牧羊犬

translation.en: and you would just love her.
translation.zh: 你一定会喜欢她的

translation.en: But I guess if you're looking down on me,
translation.zh: 但我猜如果你一直看着我

translation.en: you probably already know all of this, huh?
translation.zh: 你可能已经知道这些了 对吧？

translation.en: Well, I guess I just wanted to let you know
translation.zh: 好吧 我想我只是想告诉你

translation.en: that no matter where I go or what I do,
translation.zh: 无论我去哪儿做了什么

translation.en: every time you see me smile, I think of you.
translation.zh: 每次你看到我的笑容 我都是想你了

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Mom.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 妈妈

translation.en: We love you.
translation.zh: 我们爱你

translation.en: GLENN: Kate, hi. Hey.
translation.zh: -凯特 嗨-嗨

translation.en: Thank you so much for coming.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你能来

translation.en: Yeah. Sorry, it took me so long. No, it's fine.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我花了点时间-没事 没关系

translation.en: Did you knock on the door? Yeah, they didn't answer.
translation.zh: -你敲门了吗？-是的 他们没来开门

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Phoebe?
translation.zh: 菲比？

translation.en: Elliot?
translation.zh: 埃利奥特？

translation.en: Kimmy? Hello?
translation.zh: 吉米？有人吗？

translation.en: Looks like someone had a serious Christmas party.
translation.zh: 看来有人开了个正经的圣诞派对

translation.en: Kids? What the heck?
translation.zh: 孩子们？怎么回事？

translation.en: Kimmy? Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -吉米？-上帝啊

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: What happened to you? Where are the kids?
translation.zh: 你怎么了？孩子们在哪儿？

translation.en: What happened to me are those kids!
translation.zh: 我就是被孩子们搞成了这样

translation.en: What do you mean? Where are the kids? The kids did this to me!
translation.zh: -什么意思？孩子们在哪儿？-都是那些孩子干的

translation.en: Where are the kids?
translation.zh: 孩子们在哪儿？

translation.en: I don't know. They're probably looking for that dog
translation.zh: 我不知道 他们可能是去

translation.en: they're all worried about.
translation.zh: 找那只狗了

translation.en: The kids think that Dani did something to the dog.
translation.zh: 孩子们觉得丹妮对狗做了什么

translation.en: You don't think they went to the bakery, do you? I was just there.
translation.zh: 你不是说他们去了烘焙店吧？我刚才就在那里

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: But whatever they're doing, it's probably illegal.
translation.zh: 但是不管他们要做什么都是违法的

translation.en: Look, my kids may be a handful, but they would never do something illegal.
translation.zh: 听着 我的孩子可能很难管教但他们绝不会做违法的事

translation.en: Okay, guys, let's look for signs everywhere, anywhere
translation.zh: 伙计们 让我们到处找找

translation.en: that Belle could possibly be, all right?
translation.zh: 任何贝儿可能在地方 好吗？

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: -好的-好的

translation.en: I'm gonna take Mundy Lane to Carlson Circle.
translation.zh: 我从曼迪巷去卡尔森环路

translation.en: Great. Okay, I'll take Maple Drive to Sidereal Square.
translation.zh: 好的 我从枫树路到恒星广场

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh: -好-好的 谢谢你

translation.en: You've got to be kidding me.
translation.zh: 开玩笑吧

translation.en: Jackpot.
translation.zh: 中大奖了

translation.en: LINDA: [on answering machine] Hello, Dani, this is Linda.
translation.zh: 嗨 丹妮 我是琳达 还记得我吗？

translation.en: Remember me? Your mother?
translation.zh: 嗨 丹妮 我是琳达 还记得我吗？ 你妈妈？

translation.en: You're treating your father and me like we're dead, but we're not.
translation.zh: 你把你父亲和我当死人看待但我们没有

translation.en: We're in Florida
translation.zh: 我们在佛罗里达

translation.en: and we thought we'd talked about you coming down for the holidays.
translation.zh: 不是说好了你要来度假吗？

translation.en: Call me back. Love you, dear.
translation.zh: 回我电话 爱你 亲爱的

translation.en: Belle?
translation.zh: 贝儿？

translation.en: Belle?
translation.zh: 贝儿？

translation.en: I thought you'd be here.
translation.zh: 我以为你会在这里

translation.en: Where are you, girl?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿？

translation.en: Hi, honey, we're just finishing up here, just cleaning up.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我们这里刚刚结束只剩下清理了

translation.en: I was wondering if you could pick me up in 20?
translation.zh: 我想你能在八点来接我吗？

translation.en: Yeah, okay, but, Dani, have you seen the kids?
translation.zh: 好的 但是 丹妮

translation.en: Have they been by there?
translation.zh: 你见过孩子们吗？他们去过那边吗？

translation.en: No, I haven't seen them.
translation.zh: 没有 我没见过他们

translation.en: Okay, well, they left the house.
translation.zh: 好吧 他们不在家里

translation.en: I'm out looking for them right now.
translation.zh: 我在外面找他们

translation.en: If they come by, will you please give me a call?
translation.zh: 要是他们过去了你能给我打个电话吗？

translation.en: Gosh, anything for your kids, honey, anything.
translation.zh: 天啊 当然了 亲爱的

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
translation.zh: 好 谢谢

translation.en: Maybe Dad was right.
translation.zh: 也许爸爸说得对

translation.en: Maybe Dani didn't really take Belle.
translation.zh: 也许丹妮没有带走贝儿

translation.en: And maybe we did just imagine all this in our heads
translation.zh: 也许都是我们的想象

translation.en: because we don't like that Dad has a new girlfriend.
translation.zh: 因为我们不想爸爸有新女友

translation.en: But, Elliot, you weren't imagining that Dani is a terrible person.
translation.zh: 但是埃利奥特丹妮是个很糟糕的人 那不是想象

translation.en: And just because Belle is not here,
translation.zh: 只是贝儿不在这里

translation.en: doesn't mean Dani is not responsible for her disappearance.
translation.zh: 不代表丹妮不需要为此负责

translation.en: Yeah, she could have left the front door open
translation.zh: 是的 她可能故意没关前门

translation.en: 'cause she knew Belle would go running outside looking for you.
translation.zh: 因为她知道贝儿会出去找你

translation.en: But, guys, it doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 但是那不重要了

translation.en: Belle isn't here.
translation.zh: 贝儿不在这里

translation.en: If she's not here, then I have no idea
translation.zh: 如果她不在这里 那就不知道她可能去哪儿了

translation.en: where she could possibly be.
translation.zh: 那就不知道她可能去哪儿了

translation.en: And if I can't find her, then I can't save her!
translation.zh: 要是我找不到她 我就救不了她

translation.en: So what? So Belle is not here.
translation.zh: 所以呢？贝儿不在这里

translation.en: So we go home and start over again tomorrow.
translation.zh: 所以我们要回家每天再找

translation.en: Recruit more help and start another search.
translation.zh: 找来更多帮手继续找

translation.en: And we keep looking for her until we find her.
translation.zh: 直到我们找到为止

translation.en: The world doesn't work that way, Riley.
translation.zh: 不是那样的 莱丽

translation.en: I keep looking and waiting for my mom all the time.
translation.zh: 我一直在寻找和等待我的妈妈

translation.en: But look around, she's still not here, is she?
translation.zh: 但是看啊 她不在了 不是吗？

translation.en: And it's good she's never coming back.
translation.zh: 而且她再也不会回来了

translation.en: And sooner or later, we need to accept that Belle isn't either.
translation.zh: 迟早我们也要接受贝儿不在了

translation.en: Elliot, you're right.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 你说得对

translation.en: Sometimes rotten things happen to us
translation.zh: 有时候会发生很糟的事情

translation.en: and there's nothing we can do about it,
translation.zh: 我们没有任何办法

translation.en: but that doesn't mean we should give up on everyone else
translation.zh: 但那不代表我们应该放弃

translation.en: who still loves us and needs us.
translation.zh: 仍然爱着我们需要我们的人

translation.en: I mean, what if Belle's out there right now?
translation.zh: 我是说 要是贝儿现在在外面呢？

translation.en: And she's hurt or scared and still needs our help?
translation.zh: 她受伤了或者很害怕需要我们的帮助呢？

translation.en: Do you really think Belle would give up on you that easy?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得贝儿会那么轻易放弃吗？

translation.en: Or would your mother have, if she was still here?
translation.zh: 或者如果你妈妈还在她会吗？

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: You're right, Riley.
translation.zh: 你说得对 莱丽

translation.en: My mom would never have given up, so neither can we.
translation.zh: 我妈妈不会放弃 所以我们也不能

translation.en: Christmas is still the season of hope
translation.zh: 圣诞节仍然是充满希望的季节

translation.en: and Belle has to be out there somewhere still,
translation.zh: 贝儿一定还在某个地方

translation.en: and counting on us to find her.
translation.zh: 指望着我们找到她

translation.en: Then let's go get her.
translation.zh: 那我们就要找到她

translation.en: DANI: [on answering machine] Hello, you've reached the answering service of Daniela Downy
translation.zh: 你好 这里是丹妮拉唐尼的电话回答机

translation.en: and although I can't get to the phone at the moment,
translation.zh: 虽然我现在无法接听电话

translation.en: please feel free to leave me a pleasantry
translation.zh: 但请给我留言

translation.en: and I'll be sure to return it soon.
translation.zh: 我会尽快回复的

translation.en: KIMMY: Dani, it's Kimmy.
translation.zh: 丹妮 我是吉米

translation.en: You wouldn't believe what those snarky little tarts did to me.
translation.zh: 你不会相信那些刻薄的小混蛋对我做了什么

translation.en: Anyway, I just want to give you a heads-up.
translation.zh: 总之 我想提醒你

translation.en: Their dad's looking for them now.
translation.zh: 他们的爸爸在找他们

translation.en: But I think they went to find that dog.
translation.zh: 但我想他们是去找狗了所以你最好给动物收容所打个电话

translation.en: So you better call the pound and make sure they remove
translation.zh: 但我想他们是去找狗了所以你最好给动物收容所打个电话 让他们把那只小狗移走

translation.en: that pup from visibility
translation.zh: 让他们把那只小狗移走

translation.en: until someone pulls the plug on it.
translation.zh: 直到他们处理好它

translation.en: We have to get to the pound before they close.
translation.zh: 我们得赶在收容所关门前去那里

translation.en: But they're probably already closed.
translation.zh: 但他们可能已经关门了

translation.en: Then we break in. We have to.
translation.zh: 那我们就闯进去 我们必须进去

translation.en: There might not be much time.
translation.zh: 时间不多了

translation.en: Dani is trying to have her put to sleep.
translation.zh: 丹妮要让她安乐死

translation.en: But we can put the pound into the GPS
translation.zh: 我们要把收容所输入导航

translation.en: because we don't even know where we're going
translation.zh: 因为我们甚至不知道我们要去哪里

translation.en: and we don't even have their address.
translation.zh: 我们甚至不知道他们的地址

translation.en: Right. We need someone with a phone and a car.
translation.zh: 是的 我们需要一个有电话有车的人

translation.en: Who do we know?
translation.zh: 有谁呢？

translation.en: Well, if we had proof, we could call Dad.
translation.zh: 要是我们找到证据我们可以打给爸爸

translation.en: No, it's too late.
translation.zh: 不 已经太晚了

translation.en: We can't call Dad.
translation.zh: 我们不能打给爸爸

translation.en: He's already out looking for us, which means we're in a ton of trouble.
translation.zh: 他已经出去找我们了这意味着我们有大麻烦了

translation.en: Is there anyone else?
translation.zh: 还有别人吗？

translation.en: Wait, I know someone.
translation.zh: 等下 我知道

translation.en: We're not going.
translation.zh: 我们不去 克里斯蒂 不你答应了带我们去收容所

translation.en: Christy, no, you promised you would take us to the pound.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂 不你答应了带我们去收容所

translation.en: Yeah, well, that was to get you in the car.
translation.zh: 是啊 那是为了让你们上车

translation.en: I'm now 30 minutes late for my champagne cider party
translation.zh: 我的香槟苹果酒派对已经迟到三十分钟了

translation.en: because of you and Troy already went without me
translation.zh: 因为你和特洛伊不带我去

translation.en: because I had to pick up you and your sweaty little friends back there.
translation.zh: 因为我得去接你和你那些汗流浃背的小伙伴们

translation.en: But, Christy, Elliot's dog's life is at stake here.
translation.zh: 但是克里斯蒂埃利奥特的狗狗面临生命危险

translation.en: If the dog is there, Elliot's dad can take them to pick it up Sunday.
translation.zh: 如果狗在那里 埃利奥特的爸爸可以在周日带他们去取

translation.en: Psst. Hey, Riley.
translation.zh: 莱丽

translation.en: Twenty bucks to prove you're right.
translation.zh: 二十美元证明你是好人

translation.en: And I know you need it after Dad
translation.zh: 我知道你需要钱因为你

translation.en: cut off your allowance for failing algebra.
translation.zh: 代数不及格爸爸就不给你零用钱了

translation.en: It's locked.
translation.zh: （拴绳法严格执行所有动物都必须受到约束） 锁上了

translation.en: Hey, Mister, sorry to bother you on Christmas Eve,
translation.zh: 先生 抱歉在平安夜打扰你

translation.en: but I think you have our dog in there.
translation.zh: -但我想你把我们的狗关在里面了-是吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What makes you think that?
translation.zh: 你们怎么会这么想？

translation.en: Well, we think the lady dating our dad
translation.zh: 我们认为和我们爸爸约会的女士

translation.en: dropped her off so you guys could kill her.
translation.zh: 把她送过来是为了让你们杀了她

translation.en: How do you know it's really yours? Is it microchipped?
translation.zh: 怎么知道那真的是你们的？它装了微芯片吗？

translation.en: Not yet. We've only had her for a couple of days.
translation.zh: 还没有 我们刚领养她几天

translation.en: What's it look like?
translation.zh: 长什么样子？

translation.en: She's a cream colored shepherd.
translation.zh: 她是一只乳白色的牧羊犬

translation.en: Small, cute, fluffy.
translation.zh: 很小 很可爱 毛茸茸

translation.en: Small, cute, fluffy.
translation.zh: 很小 很可爱 毛茸茸

translation.en: No, I don't got no cute dogs in here.
translation.zh: 不 这里没有可爱的狗

translation.en: She would have been dropped off today
translation.zh: 她今天应该是被一个

translation.en: by a big-headed blonde lady.
translation.zh: 大头金发女士送过来的

translation.en: Oh, yeah, the bird killer.
translation.zh: 是的 鸟类杀手

translation.en: Bird killer? Belle never killed any bird.
translation.zh: 鸟类杀手？ 贝儿没有杀过一只鸟

translation.en: How would you know?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道？

translation.en: You just said you've only had her for a few days.
translation.zh: 你说你才领养她几天

translation.en: Because I think I know my own dog pretty well, okay?
translation.zh: 因为我了解我的狗 好吗？

translation.en: All right, fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: That'll be 60 bucks and you can buy the little mutt back.
translation.zh: 六十美元 你可以把它买回去

translation.en: Sixty bucks?
translation.zh: 六十美元 你可以把它买回去 六十美元

translation.en: We don't have 60 bucks.
translation.zh: 我们没有六十美元

translation.en: Here, this is all we have left.
translation.zh: 这里我们只有这些

translation.en: You don't got 40 more dollars,
translation.zh: 你们拿不出另外的四十美元

translation.en: I don't got no bird killer for you.
translation.zh: 我就不能把鸟类杀手给你们

translation.en: Ugh. Now what?
translation.zh: 现在怎么办？

translation.en: Come on, I've got an idea.
translation.zh: 我有个主意

translation.en: MAN [on TV]:... the more the muscle's gonna grow.
translation.zh: 肌肉就会长得越多

translation.en: Okay, take a look at what I've done here.
translation.zh: 好了 看看我都做了些什么

translation.en: No freaking way.
translation.zh: 绝对没门

translation.en: Those toes just aren't gonna pedicure themselves.
translation.zh: 你的脚趾可不会自己修脚

translation.en: Hi. My name is Christy Kane.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是克里斯蒂凯恩

translation.en: You know, like a candy cane.
translation.zh: 就像拐杖糖一样

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: -嗨-抱歉打扰你

translation.en: I'm sorry to bother you
translation.zh: -嗨-抱歉打扰你 但我刚从一个苹果酒派对回家

translation.en: but I was just on my way home from this apple cider party
translation.zh: 但我刚从一个苹果酒派对回家

translation.en: and I just had way too much cider, you see,
translation.zh: 我喝了太多苹果酒

translation.en: and I just don't think I can wait till I get home,
translation.zh: 我觉得我等不及回家了

translation.en: so may I use your ladies' room?
translation.zh: 我能借用下洗手间吗？

translation.en: Yeah. My bird drinks way too much apple cider too.
translation.zh: 是的 我的鸟也喝太多苹果酒了

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 请进

translation.en: Bathroom is right through there.
translation.zh: 洗手间就在那边

translation.en: Just holler at me if you need any toilet paper or anything.
translation.zh: 如果你需要卫生纸或其他东西叫我就好

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Toilet paper. Stupid!
translation.zh: 厕纸 太蠢了！

translation.en: Belle!
translation.zh: 贝儿！

translation.en: So how are we gonna get her?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么救她出来？

translation.en: You guys are just gonna stay here
translation.zh: 你们待在这里

translation.en: and when he goes back in that office,
translation.zh: 等他回到办公室

translation.en: we're just gonna sneak up and spring him out really fast,
translation.zh: 我们要溜过去 很快把他放出来

translation.en: so we all can run right out of here, okay?
translation.zh: 然后我们才能冲出去 好吗？

translation.en: But, Elliot, what about the others?
translation.zh: 但是埃利奥特 其他狗怎么办？

translation.en: We can't just leave the other dogs here.
translation.zh: 我们不能把狗留在这里

translation.en: This is the pound.
translation.zh: 这里是收容所

translation.en: They'll all be doomed unless we save them.
translation.zh: 如果我们不能救了他们 他们就完了

translation.en: I know, but we can't fit all of them in your sister's car.
translation.zh: 我知道 但你姐姐的车装不下

translation.en: There's not enough room.
translation.zh: 空间不够

translation.en: There's a bunch of other dogs in here.
translation.zh: 这里还有很多狗

translation.en: We may not be able to fit all of them in your fine sister's car,
translation.zh: 我们无法把他们都塞进你姐姐的车里

translation.en: but I bet we can fit some of them
translation.zh: 但我想我们可以

translation.en: into that pound van we saw out back.
translation.zh: 塞到后面的货车上

translation.en: We just need keys.
translation.zh: 我们只是需要钥匙

translation.en: And as it just so happens,
translation.zh: 碰巧的是

translation.en: I happen to know a very good key thief.
translation.zh: 我认识一个很厉害的偷钥匙高手

translation.en: All better now? Yeah.
translation.zh: -好了吗？-是的

translation.en: Thanks, I really appreciate you letting me use your restroom.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我很感激你让我用你的洗手间

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: Which translates to I wouldn't stand on that toilet in my cheapest pair of shoes.
translation.zh: 也就是说我不会穿着我最便宜的鞋子站在马桶上

translation.en: And a very merry Christmas to you.
translation.zh: 祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: Merry Christmas to you too, Miss Kane.
translation.zh: 也祝你圣诞快乐 凯恩小姐

translation.en: Malcolm, now you pull the van up so we can load.
translation.zh: 马尔科姆你把车开上来 我们好装东西

translation.en: Riley, you and I will need to take one side.
translation.zh: 莱丽 你和我需要站在一边

translation.en: We'll go down one by one
translation.zh: 我们一个一个下去

translation.en: till all the dogs are out safely, all right?
translation.zh: 直到所有的狗都安全出去 好吗？

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Phoebe, let's go!
translation.zh: 菲比 我们走！

translation.en: What are you kids doing?
translation.zh: 你们这些孩子在做什么？

translation.en: Malcolm, let's move!
translation.zh: 马尔科姆 开车

translation.en: I have to call the police.
translation.zh: 我得报警了

translation.en: Malcolm?
translation.zh: 马尔科姆？

translation.en: You okay, girl?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: I've been worried sick about you.
translation.zh: 我担心死你了

translation.en: It's good to have you back.
translation.zh: 你能回来真好

translation.en: You did all right tonight, Elliot.
translation.zh: 你今晚做得很好 埃利奥特

translation.en: I didn't think you had it in you.
translation.zh: 我没想到你有这个本事

translation.en: I did.
translation.zh: 我有

translation.en: But, guys, how are we gonna feed all these dogs tomorrow?
translation.zh: 但是伙计们我们明天要怎么喂他们？

translation.en: The pet stores won't be open on Christmas.
translation.zh: 宠物店圣诞节不营业

translation.en: We can call Kate from the rescue.
translation.zh: 我们可以打电话给救援队的凯特 她会知道怎么处理

translation.en: She will know what to do with them.
translation.zh: 她会知道怎么处理

translation.en: Who is that following us?
translation.zh: 谁在跟着我们

translation.en: I think it's that crazy dog catcher.
translation.zh: 我觉得是那个疯狂的捕狗人

translation.en: Uh-oh.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: Dad's on our trail now too.
translation.zh: 爸爸现在也在跟着我们

translation.en: Oh, man, if I get arrested, my mom's gonna kill me!
translation.zh: 天啊 要是我被逮住 我妈妈会杀了我！

translation.en: Pull over before he causes a wreck.
translation.zh: 在他撞车前靠边停车

translation.en: Now that we have Belle, my dad will get us out of trouble.
translation.zh: 现在我们找到了贝儿爸爸会帮我们摆脱麻烦

translation.en: Pull over right there!
translation.zh: 靠边停车！

translation.en: I'm trying!
translation.zh: 我这不是想办法停下来吗？

translation.en: No, that's my cake!
translation.zh: 不 那是我的蛋糕！

translation.en: Is everybody okay?
translation.zh: 大家都没事吧？

translation.en: We're great, Dad.
translation.zh: 我们没事 爸爸

translation.en: Look, we even found Belle.
translation.zh: 听着 我们找到了贝儿

translation.en: So how was your night?
translation.zh: 你今晚怎么样？

translation.en: Get out.
translation.zh: 下车

translation.en: You need some help up?
translation.zh: 需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: But, Dad, we had to take the other dogs
translation.zh: 但是爸爸 我们得把其他狗带上

translation.en: or else he was gonna kill them.
translation.zh: 不然他会杀了他们

translation.en: Elliot, that is not your place.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 这里不是你说了算

translation.en: Okay, and you should know that stealing someone's vehicle
translation.zh: 好吧 你应该知道偷别人的车

translation.en: is a very serious offense,
translation.zh: 是非常严重的罪行

translation.en: especially if that vehicle belongs to the city.
translation.zh: 尤其是车还属于市政

translation.en: Oh. Oh, you must be from the pound.
translation.zh: 你一定是收容所的人

translation.en: Yeah, look, I'm so sorry about any trouble this might have
translation.zh: 听着 我很抱歉 今晚给你造成的麻烦

translation.en: caused you tonight, but it's a big mix up.
translation.zh: 今晚给你造成的麻烦 但这搞错了

translation.en: See, this dog here, this actually is our dog.
translation.zh: 这只狗是我们的狗

translation.en: Yeah? Well, if you want it back, it's gonna cost you,
translation.zh: 是吗？ 你要它回去你得花点钱

translation.en: Mr. Fancy Pants.
translation.zh: 奇装异服先生

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 这狗还有搞定这圣诞意外

translation.en: How much for the dog and, you know,
translation.zh: 这狗还有搞定这圣诞意外 一共多少钱？

translation.en: to keep this little Christmas incident between the two of us?
translation.zh: 一共多少钱？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: For that amount--
translation.zh: 那个数字

translation.en: Okay, okay, sure, that's just fine.
translation.zh: 好吧 当然了 没问题

translation.en: No plastic. No.
translation.zh: 不能刷卡

translation.en: No, of course, all right.
translation.zh: 当然了 好的

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You can just return my van after you transport the pups.
translation.zh: 你把狗送走后再把我的车还给我吧

translation.en: Enjoy them.
translation.zh: 都归你了

translation.en: Thanks, Dad. You're our hero.
translation.zh: 谢谢爸爸 你是我们的英雄

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: And sorry we left the house without your permission.
translation.zh: 抱歉我们未经同意出门了

translation.en: Well, that's okay, actually I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 没事 事实上我很抱歉

translation.en: I apologize to you guys.
translation.zh: 我向你们道歉

translation.en: I should have never left you on Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 我不应该在平安夜丢下你们

translation.en: But, we still have plenty to talk about, okay?
translation.zh: 但是 我们还是有很多要聊聊 好吗？

translation.en: And don't even think about keeping any more of these dogs,
translation.zh: 别想再养这些狗

translation.en: we are not gonna do that.
translation.zh: 我们不会养那么多

translation.en: We will, however, find homes for each
translation.zh: 但是我们 可以帮他们找到家

translation.en: and every one of them and you guys
translation.zh: 可以帮他们找到家 你们会有足够多时间

translation.en: will have plenty of time to look because you're both grounded.
translation.zh: 你们会有足够多时间 因为你们被禁足了

translation.en: Wait, where's Belle?
translation.zh: 等等 贝儿哪去了？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Oh, this is all your fault, you mangy little home-wrecking--
translation.zh: 都是你的错 你个肮脏的家庭破坏者

translation.en: Back off, big headed-blondie.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 大头金发女

translation.en: We know you lied and we know you took Belle
translation.zh: 我们知道你骗人我们还知道你带走了贝儿

translation.en: and left her at the pound to be killed.
translation.zh: 把她送去收容所杀掉 格林 你听到了吗？

translation.en: Glenn, do you hear this?
translation.zh: 格林 你听到了吗？

translation.en: Do you hear what they are accusing me of?
translation.zh: 你听到他们对我的指控了吗？

translation.en: Oh, come on, what kind of proof do you have anyway?
translation.zh: 拜托 你有什么证据？

translation.en: It's all on this machine.
translation.zh: 都在这里

translation.en: RILEY: Including a recent message from your mom,
translation.zh: 包括你妈妈的最新消息

translation.en: who must somehow be calling from the grave,
translation.zh: 她一定是从地狱打的电话

translation.en: or is it Florida?
translation.zh: 或者是佛罗里达

translation.en: Wait, you broke into my house and you stole things?
translation.zh: 等下 你们闯进了我家还偷东西？

translation.en: It's not really breaking in when you have the keys.
translation.zh: 有钥匙就不是闯入了

translation.en: Plus, we did it for the right reason,
translation.zh: 而且我们有理由这么做

translation.en: unlike you who took Belle and stole jewelry
translation.zh: 不像你带走贝儿 为了自己的利益偷了我母亲的珠宝

translation.en: that was my mother's for your own gain, right?
translation.zh: 为了自己的利益偷了我母亲的珠宝

translation.en: Is that my wife's necklace?
translation.zh: 那是我妻子的项链吗？

translation.en: Um, I--I was just trying it on
translation.zh: 我只是想试一下 本来打算还回去的

translation.en: and I was going to return it, but I just--
translation.zh: 我只是想试一下 本来打算还回去的 但我…

translation.en: I got busy with the cake and the children's hospital and everything.
translation.zh: 我忙着做蛋糕忙着去儿童医院什么的

translation.en: I was just trying to-- How do you see yourself, Dani?
translation.zh: -我只是想-你怎么看你自己 丹妮？

translation.en: Are you one of those people who expects
translation.zh: 你是那种每做一件好事

translation.en: some kind of reward with every single good deed that you do?
translation.zh: 都希望得到某种回报的人吗？

translation.en: Have you ever just one time done something kind
translation.zh: 你是否曾经做过一件好事

translation.en: and loving just because it was the right thing to do?
translation.zh: 你是否曾经做过一件好事 仅仅是因为那是正确的选择呢？

translation.en: I already have my opinion on that.
translation.zh: 我已经有了自己的看法

translation.en: May I have my wife's necklace please?
translation.zh: 可以把我妻子的项链给我吗？

translation.en: Let's go, kids.
translation.zh: 走吧 孩子们

translation.en: Your red velvet, it needs work too.
translation.zh: 你的红丝绒蛋糕 也还需要努力

translation.en: She's right about your red velvet, Dani.
translation.zh: 她说得对 丹妮

translation.en: Oh, and by the way, you're fired, dear.
translation.zh: 还有你被开除了

translation.en: Well, if it looks like a duck, quacks like a duck,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果看起来像鸭子 叫起来像鸭子

translation.en: it's probably a gold digger.
translation.zh: 可能就是个拜金者
